power.name: Administrate
power.text: Add 2 tokens to your bug pool. You may play any number of Bug cards

ul.li: One player may use a power now.
Deal 1 melee and 1 toxic damage to a target.
One player may search their trash for an Equipment card and put it in their hand.

card.name: Surveying
card.text: Reveal the top 3 cards of the environment deck. Put 1 on top of the environment deck, and 2 on the bottom of the environment deck

card.name: Regroup
card.text: Add the HP of each Bug card you control to your bug pool. Return each Bug card you control to your hand. Draw a card. Play a card

card.name: Bees!
card.text: Remove any number of tokens from your bug pool. Deal 2 melee and 2 toxic damage to X targets, where X = the number of tokens you removed

card.name: Delivery
card.text: Remove any number of tokens from your bug pool. Draw that many cards

card.name: Situational Awareness
card.text: Whenever a hero target would be dealt 5 or more damage from a single source, reduce that damage by 2

card.name: Always Planning
card.text: Whenever a hero is dealt 5 or more damage from a single source, you may search your deck for a card and put it into your hand. If you searched your deck, shuffle it

card.name: Silk Armour
card.text: Reduce damage dealt to Skitter by 1

card.name: Prepared Threads
card.text: Power: Destroy an Environment or Ongoing card

card.name: Bug Decoy
card.text: When you play this card, remove any number of tokens from your bug pool. This card has that much HP. Whenever a non-hero target deals damage to a hero target, redirect the damage to this card

card.name: Swarm
card.text: When you play this card, remove any number of tokens from your bug pool. This card has that much HP. At the end of your turn, this card deals 1 melee and 1 toxic damage to up to X targets, where X = this target's HP

card.name: Spiders
card.text: When you play this card, remove any number of tokens from your bug pool. This card has that much HP. At the end of your turn, this target deals X toxic damage to 1 target, where X = this target's HP - 1

card.name: Relay Bugs
card.text: When you play this card, remove any number of tokens from your bug pool. This card has that much HP. At the end of your turn, add 1 token to your bug pool

card.name: Tracking Bugs
card.text: When you play this card, remove any number of tokens from your bug pool. This card has that much HP. Whenever a non-hero target enters play, this target deals it 1 melee and 1 toxic damage, and then deals itself 1 melee damage

card.name: Atlas
card.text: Skitter is immune to damage from environment cards. At the end of your turn, draw 1 card. At the end of your turn, this card deals itself 1 psychic damage
